committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to change the date of the legal public holiday of Memorial Day from the last Monday in May to May 30.

summary.text: Changes the observance of Memorial Day from the last Monday in May to May 30.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to change the date of the legal public holiday of Memorial Day from the last Monday in May to May 30.
